name: Water content
description: Natural water content determination of soil samples
result: Water content as % of water to dry mass
materialRequired:
50 g (fine grained)
100 g (medium grained)
200 g (coarse grained)

name: Atterberg Limits & Classification
description: Atterberg Limits determination of soil samples. Includes wet sieving (#10, #40, #200) to allow for USCS and AASHTO Classification. Does not include full particle size distribution analysis.
result: Atterberg limits, % passing #10, #40 and #200 sieves and Soil Classification according to USCS and AASHTO.
materialRequired: 300 g of material passing #4 sieve.

name: Particle Size Distribution (sieve analysis)
description: Full particle size distribution analysis by sieving, including sizes from 3" to #200.
result: Particle Size Distribution curve and Soil Classification for coarse soils (Combination with Atterberg Limits is necessary if 5% or more fine material is present).
materialRequired:
Nominal Size (mm)Mass (kg)
6340
5035
37.514
286
202
141
100.50
6.30.30
3.350.20
<20.10

name: Particle Size Distribution (hydrometer analysis)
description: Particle size distribution analysis of material finer than 75 microns (percentages of clay and silt fractions).
result: Particle Size Distribution curve of material finer than 75 microns, and percentages of clay and silt.
materialRequired: See Particle Size Distribution (sieve analysis).

name: Density and Unit Weight
description: Bulk and dry density of undisturbed soil samples. Cylindrical o cubical samples will be tested by linear method, while irregular samples will be tested by immersion.
result: Bulk and dry density/unit weight of soil.
materialRequired: An intact soil sample of at least 1 kg and 50 mm diameter.

name: Minimum and Maximum density
description: Maximum and minimum dry density of sand.
materialRequired:
For maximum density of sand: 6 kg
For maximum density of gravel: 16 kg
For minimum density of sand: 2 kg
For minimum density of gravel: 10 kg

name: Standard Proctor (T-99)
description: Determination of dry density-moisture relationship of soil using 2,5 kg hammer (standard effort).
materialRequired:
For materials with less than 5% larger than 20 mm.: 15 kg
For materials with more than 5% larger than 20 mm.: 40 kg

name: Modified Proctor (T-180)
description: Determination of dry density-moisture relationship of soil using 4,5 kg hammer (modified effort).
materialRequired:
For materials with less than 5% larger than 20 mm.: 15 kg
For materials with more than 5% larger than 20 mm.: 40 kg

name: California Bearing Ratio (CBR)
description: Determination of California Bearing Ratio value for compacted soils. Includes up to 6 remoulded and 5-day soaked specimens.
materialRequired:
For materials with less than 5% larger than 20 mm.: 15 kg
For materials with more than 5% larger than 20 mm.: 40 kg

name: One-Dimensional Consolidation
description: One-dimensional consolidation (Oedometer) of undisturbed, saturated soil samples. Includes up to 7 loading stages (max. stress = 800 kPa) and 3 unloading stages. Maximum duration is 10 days (extra days will be charged separately).
materialRequired: Liner sample at least 10 cm long or block sample at least 10 cm. x 10 cm. x 10 cm.

name: Triaxial Consolidation
description: Triaxial consolidation of undisturbed, saturated soil samples. Includes one stress level up to 4 days (extra days will be charged separately).
materialRequired: Liner sample with at least 2 length/diameter ratio or block sample twice the size of 2:1 length/diameter ratio.

name: Unconfined Compressive Strenght
description: Unconfined compressive strength of soil samples. Remoulding is charged separately ($20 per specimen).
unit: Undisturbed sample or Disturbed sample (for remoulding)
materialRequired: Liner sample with at least 2 length/diameter ratio or block sample twice the size of 2:1 length/diameter ratio.

name: Quick Triaxial Single Stage (UU)
description: Single Stage Unconsolidated Undrained Triaxial (only one confining stress stage) for 38 mm. or 70 mm. diameter specimen.
unit: Undisturbed sample or Disturbed sample (for remoulding)
materialRequired: Liner sample with at least 2 length/diameter ratio or block sample twice the size of 2:1 length/diameter ratio.

name: Quick Triaxial Multi Stage (UU)
description: Multi Stage Unconsolidated Undrained Triaxial (up to three confining stress stages) for 38 mm. or 70 mm. diameter specimen.
unit: Undisturbed sample or Disturbed sample (for remoulding)
materialRequired: Liner sample with at least 2 length/diameter ratio or block sample twice the size of 2:1 length/diameter ratio.

name: Direct Shear Test
description: Direct Shear Test (up to three vertical stress stages) for 38 mm. or 50 mm. diameter specimen.
unit: Undisturbed sample or Disturbed sample (for remoulding)
materialRequired: Liner sample with at least 2 length/diameter ratio or block sample twice the size of 2:1 length/diameter ratio.

name: Consolidated Undrained Triaxial (CU)
description: Consolidated Undrained Triaxial Test with pore pressure measurement for effective stress analysis. Price is indicated for a single specimen at a defined consolidation pressure. Maximum duration of the test is 4 days (Extra days will be charged separately).
unit: Undisturbed sample or Disturbed sample (for remoulding)
materialRequired: Liner sample with at least 2 length/diameter ratio or block sample twice the size of 2:1 length/diameter ratio.

name: Consolidated Drained Triaxial (CD)
description: Consolidated Drained Triaxial Test for effective stress analysis. Price is indicated for a single specimen at a defined consolidation pressure. Maximum duration of the test is 4 days (Extra days will be charged separately).
unit: Undisturbed sample or Disturbed sample (for remoulding)
materialRequired: Liner sample with at least 2 length/diameter ratio or block sample twice the size of 2:1 length/diameter ratio.

name: Permeability (Constant Head)
description: Permeability test in rigid permeameter using the Constant Head Method. This test is suitable for gravels and sands only.
materialRequired: At least 5 kg of disturbed sample.

name: Permeability (Falling Head)
description: Permeability test in flexible wall permeameter using the Falling Head Method. This test is suitable for silts and clays only.
unit: Undisturbed sample of Disturbed sample (for remoulding)
materialRequired: Liner sample with at least 2 length/diameter ratio or block sample twice the size of 2:1 length/diameter ratio.

name: Point Load Test
description: Point Load Test of single rock specimen.
materialRequired: Rock core sample 38 mm. to 105 mm. diameter.

name: Unconfined Compressive Strenght of Rock
description: UCS of single rock specimen.
materialRequired: Rock core sample 38 mm. to 105 mm. diameter and at least 2 length/diameter ratio.

name: Unconfined Compressive Strenght of Rock + Young Modulus
description: UCS of single rock specimen and Young Modulus determination.
materialRequired: Rock core sample 38 mm. to 105 mm. diameter and at least 2 length/diameter ratio.

name: Unconfined Compressive Strenght of Rock + Young Modulus + Poisson Ratio
description: UCS of single rock specimen, Young Modulus and Poisson Ratio determination.
materialRequired: Rock core sample 38 mm. to 105 mm. diameter and at least 2 length/diameter ratio.

name: pH
description: pH determination on soil sample.
materialRequired: At least 100 g. of soil sample.

name: Total and soluble sulphates (Soil)
description: Both total and water soluble sulphates on soil sample.
materialRequired: At least 100 g. of soil sample.

name: Total sulphates (Groundwater)
description: Total sulphates on groundwater sample.
materialRequired: At least 0.5 liters of groundwater.

name: Organic Matter of Soil
description: Organic Matter Content of soil sample.
materialRequired: At least 100 g of soil sample.
